item.title: Code Syntax Highlighting in Nano (Linux Editor)
item.description: Today i was looking for a way to enable extended code syntax highlighting in the linux text editor nano, out of the box nano comes with limited functionality to do this. I will tell you how to download the needed files and add them to the nano configuration and you will be looking at much prettier code in no time.
